Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King/66th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: King, Marquette, Eberhart, 64th & King ; SB: King, 65th, Vernon, Marquette & King Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near King/66th.

Northbound buses will operate via  King, Marquette, Eberhart, 64th and King .

Southbound buses will operate via King, 65th, Vernon, Marquette & King Dr.

Allow extra travel time.
